title: His Storyy
overview: His Storyy is a rollercoaster tale of a power couple, Kunal-Sakshi who lead a perfect married life since 15 years and are the epitome of perfection that makes their friends red with envy. But then a startling revelation comes to light, creating trouble in paradise. What is that revelation? Will Kunal and Sakshi be able to get through or will their marital bliss come crashing down?
